name: Gunsport
description: Gunsport is a two-on-two mini online eSport – it's cyperpunk volleyball with guns. The game is all about keeping the ball in the air, shooting it into a goal at a choice moment. The more times the ball passes the net, the more points it’s worth, upping the stakes with every pass. And your shots are limited, so you have to aim carefully, time your shots with care, and communicate with your teammate.
